means: U. S. English 美国英语
United States English 美国英语
United States Embassy 美国大使馆

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"使用，应用"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: use, apply, employ, utilize, avail, exploit
means: use ： 普通用词，着重为达到某一目的而利用某人或某物。
apply ： 指将一事物运用于另一事物之上以发挥其有效作用。
employ ： 指使用处于消极状态或未被用过的人或物，可以与use换用，但强调进行选择、充分利用。
utilize ： 侧重有利可图或能达到某一实际目的。书面用词。
avail ： 通常指使用手边或就近的人或物以有利于自己。

用字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 用事〖 beinpower〗 用途〖 good;usefulness;use〗 用武〖 useforce〗.

list.abs: Remote Control Server side code , using JPG compression speed quickly ., 远程控制服务端代码 , 采用 JPG 压缩传输速度很快.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... used a. 用过的；旧的；二手的 useful a. 有用的，有益的 useless a. 无用的.
...，倒是十分恰当。因为它宣称珍道具并非完全“无用”(useless)，可是实际又没办法使，也就算不上“有用”(useful)，于是只好被称作“并非无用”了。
...优势国内一些域名投资者注册大量.us域名并不在于看中了us的国别意义,而是把它看成us(我们)的含义,他们认为这才是.us的对于大众的真正意义在有超过33,000家的美资企业以及100,000家.
alfred binet believed his iq test should be used to ., 比奈智商测试 , 相信他应该用于.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)be useful on certain occasions or in certain respects
be unable to find a purpose for; have no need for

lj.lj_ly: he had no use for a single glove.

jx.jx_en_mean: quote someone as an authority or reference
jx.jx_cn_mean: 引用某人名字；打出某人旗号

jx.jx_en_mean: consume or expend the whole of something

lj.lj_ly: the money was soon used up.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: the noun from Old French us, from Latin usus, from uti 'to use'; the verb from Old French user, based on Latin uti

encyclopedia.content: 统一安全引擎，一次拆包完成多种分析任务，从根本上解决UTM对资源重复性消耗的问题。 use① vt. 1. 用，使用 May I use your pen? 我用一下你的笔可以吗？ 2. 发挥；行使 He promised to use his influence. 他答应运用他的影响力。 3. 耗费 4. 利用锛埶恕⑹奔洹⒒龅蕊級 They used him to shock the others. 他们利用他来吓唬别人。 5. 对待[O] He used her worse than ever. 他待她比过去更糟了。 vi. 1. 锛埾纸鲇糜趗sed t

entry.def: If you use something, you do something with it in order to do a job or to achieve a particular result or effect.

example.ex: Trim off the excess pastry using a sharp knife...
example.tran: 用一把快刀切去多余的饼皮。

example.ex: He had simply used a little imagination...
example.tran: 他只不过是用了一点点想象力。

entry.def: If you use a supply of something, you finish it so that none of it is left.

example.ex: You used all the ice cubes and didn't put the ice trays back...
example.tran: 你把所有的冰块都用完了，又不把冰格放回去。

example.ex: They've never had anything spare — they've always used it all.
example.tran: 他们从没有任何备用的东西——他们总是把什么都用得一干二净。

entry.def: If someone uses drugs, they take drugs regularly, especially illegal ones.

example.ex: He denied he had used drugs...
example.tran: 他否认自己吸过毒。

example.ex: You'll find that most people that don't use heroin don't like people that do.
example.tran: 你会发现绝大多数不吸海洛因的人都不喜欢吸食者。

entry.tran: 用（洗手间或卫生间）（礼貌说法）
entry.def: You can say that someone uses the toilet or bathroom as a polite way of saying that they go to the toilet.

example.ex: Wash your hands after using the toilet...
example.tran: 便后要洗手。

example.ex: He asked whether he could use my bathroom.
example.tran: 他问是否可以用我的卫生间。

entry.def: If you use a particular word or expression, you say or write it, because it has the meaning that you want to express.

example.ex: The judge liked using the word 'wicked' of people he had sent to jail...
example.tran: 这个法官喜欢使用“邪恶”一词来形容被他判罪入狱的人。

example.ex: When Johnson talks about cuts, he uses words like 'target price' and 'efficiency payments'.
example.tran: 约翰逊谈起降价时，会使用“目标价位”和“效率支付”之类的字眼。

entry.def: If you use a particular name, you call yourself by that name, especially when it is not the name that you usually call yourself.

example.ex: Now I use a false name if I'm meeting people for the first time...
example.tran: 现在和初次见面的人交往时我会用假名。

example.ex: I didn't want to use my married name because we've split.
example.tran: 我不想用我的夫姓，因为我们已经离婚了。

entry.def: If you say that someone uses people, you disapprove of them because they make others do things for them in order to benefit or gain some advantage from it, and not because they care about the other people.

example.ex: Be careful she's not just using you...
example.tran: 当心她不只是在利用你。

example.ex: Why do I have the feeling I'm being used again?
example.tran: 为什么我感觉又被利用了？

entry.def: Your use of something is the action or fact of your using it.

example.ex: The treatment does not involve the use of any artificial drugs.
example.tran: 这种治疗不会使用任何人工合成药物。

example.ex: ...research related to microcomputers and their use in classrooms...
example.tran: 关于微型电脑及其课堂使用的研究

entry.def: If you have a use for something, you need it or can find something to do with it.

example.ex: You will no longer have a use for the magazines...
example.tran: 你再也用不着这些杂志了。

example.ex: They both loved the fabric, but couldn't find a use for it.
example.tran: 他们都很喜爱这块布，可是不知道拿来做什么好。

entry.def: If something has a particular use, it is intended for a particular purpose.

example.ex: Infrared detectors have many uses...
example.tran: 红外探测器有多种用途。

example.ex: It's an interesting scientific phenomenon, but of no practical use whatever...
example.tran: 这是一种有趣的科学现象，但没什么实用价值。

entry.def: If you have the use of something, you have the permission or ability to use it.

example.ex: She will have the use of the car one night a week.
example.tran: 她每周有一个晚上会用车。

example.ex: ...young people who at some point in the past have lost the use of their limbs...
example.tran: 曾经一度手脚失去功能的年轻人

entry.def: A use of a word is a particular meaning that it has or a particular way in which it can be used.

example.ex: There are new uses of words coming in and old uses dying out.
example.tran: 单词总有新用法出现，也有旧用法慢慢被淘汰。

entry.def: Your use of a particular name is the fact of your calling yourself by it.

example.ex: Police have been hampered by Mr Urquhart's use of bogus names.
example.tran: 厄克特先生使用了假名，警方的调查因此受阻。

entry.def: If something is for the use of a particular person or group of people, it is for that person or group to use.

example.ex: The leisure facilities are there for the use of guests...
example.tran: 这些休闲设施是供客人使用的。

example.ex: He raises crops mainly for the use of his family.
example.tran: 他种农作物主要是为了家庭自用。

entry.def: If you say that being something or knowing someone has its uses, you mean that it makes it possible for you to do what you otherwise would not be able to do.

example.ex: Being a hospital Sister had its uses.
example.tran: 在医院当护士有它的好处。

entry.def: If something such as a technique, building, or machine is in use, it is used regularly by people. If it has gone out of use, it is no longer used regularly by people.

example.ex: ...the methods of making Champagne which are still in use today...
example.tran: 至今仍在用的香槟酿制法

example.ex: The site has been out of use for many years.
example.tran: 这个地方已经闲置多年。

entry.def: If you make use of something, you do something with it in order to do a job or achieve a particular result or effect.

example.ex: Not all nursery schools make use of the opportunities open to them.
example.tran: 并不是所有的托儿所都能抓住他们面临的机会。

example.ex: ...making use of the same bottle time after time.
example.tran: 多次重复使用同一个瓶子

entry.def: You use expressions such as it's no use ,there's no use, and what's the use to indicate that a particular action will not achieve anything.

example.ex: It's no use arguing with a drunk...
example.tran: 跟一个醉汉争论是没有用处的。

example.ex: There's no use you asking me any more questions...
example.tran: 你问我再多的问题也没有用。

entry.def: If you say it's no use, you mean that you have failed to do something and realize that it is useless to continue trying because it is impossible.

example.ex: It's no use. Let's hang up and try for a better line.
example.tran: 打不通。挂掉吧，找一条更好的线打吧。

entry.def: If something or someone is of use, they are useful. If they are no use, they are not at all useful.

example.ex: The contents of this booklet should be of use to all students...
example.tran: 这本小册子的内容应该会对所有的学生都有用处。

example.ex: I'm sorry, I've been no use to you.
example.tran: 对不起，我一点儿忙也没帮上。

sentences.sentence: "he warned against the use of narcotic drugs"
"skilled in the utilization of computers"
"he put his knowledge to good use"
"patrons have their uses"
"the function of an auger is to bore holes"
"ballet is beautiful but what use is it?"

means.word_mean: 4. (economics) the utilization of economic goods to satisfy needs or in manufacturing;

sentences.sentence: "the consumption of energy has increased steadily"

means.word_mean: 5. a pattern of behavior acquired through frequent repetition;

sentences.sentence: "she had a habit twirling the ends of her hair"
"long use had hardened him to it"

means.word_mean: 6. (law) the exercise of the legal right to enjoy the benefits of owning property;

sentences.sentence: "we were given the use of his boat"

means.word_mean: 7. exerting shrewd or devious influence especially for one's own advantage;

sentences.sentence: "his manipulation of his friends was scandalous"

means.word_mean: 1. put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose;

sentences.sentence: "use your head!"
"we only use Spanish at home"
"I can't make use of this tool"
"Apply a magnetic field here"
"This thinking was applied to many projects"
"How do you utilize this tool?"
"I apply this rule to get good results"
"use the plastic bags to store the food"
"He doesn't know how to use a computer"
"She uses drugs rarely"

means.word_mean: 3. seek or achieve an end by using to one's advantage;

sentences.sentence: "She uses her influential friends to get jobs"
"The president's wife used her good connections"
"The legislature expended its time on school questions"
"apply a principle"
"practice a religion"
"use care when going down the stairs"
"use your common sense"
"practice non-violent resistance"

means.word_mean: 6. habitually do something (use only in the past tense);

sentences.sentence: "She used to call her mother every week but now she calls only occasionally"
"I used to get sick when I ate in that dining hall"
"They used to vacation in the Bahamas"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无用的, 无效的, 无益的, 无价值的
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用+less无→adj.无用的, 无效的, 无益的, 无价值的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有用的, 有益的, 有帮手的
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用+ful表形容词→adj.有用的, 有益的, 有帮手的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使用, 利用, 耗费
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用→n.&v.使用, 利用, 耗费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 打消[某人]的错误念头,纠正
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis去掉+abuse[n.&v.滥用]→去掉滥用→纠正错误

means.word_mean: 使用; 利用, 运用

sentences.en: May I use your knife for a while?
sentences.cn: 我用一下你的小刀行吗?

sentences.en: He used his job as a screen for his spying activities.
sentences.cn: 他利用他的工作作掩护进行间谍活动。

sentences.en: All the paper has been used.

means.word_mean: 使用, 应用, 得到利用

sentences.en: For use only in case of fire!

means.word_mean: 用途, 效用, 功能, 用法

sentences.en: It is an electronic device with many uses.
sentences.cn: 这是一部具有多种用途的电子仪器。

means.word_mean: 使用能力; 使用权; 使用机会

sentences.en: This is for the use of students only.
The boy regained the use of his arm.
sentences.cn: 这男孩恢复了手臂的功能。

jushi.english: The milk should be used before October 5.
jushi.chinese: 牛奶必须在10月5日前用掉。

jushi.english: They also learned to use the abacus.
They begged him to use his influence.
jushi.chinese: 他们恳求他运用他的影响。
